edge_case_tests.description: Edge cases and challenging scenarios for stance detection

ambiguous.description: Ambiguous texts that could be interpreted multiple ways

cases.text: The proposed tax changes have both supporters and critics making valid points.
Digital privacy is important, but so is national security.
Trade agreements have complex economic impacts that experts debate.
Oh great, another traffic jam. I just LOVE sitting in my car for hours.
Another 3-hour meeting that could have been an email. So productive!
Seven dollars for a cup of coffee? What a bargain!

implicit.description: Texts with implicit rather than explicit stance

cases.text: After eating that burger, I felt sluggish and regretted my lunch choice.
My morning run always leaves me energized and ready to tackle the day.
Whenever I finish a good book, I feel like I've lived multiple lives and learned so much.
If self-driving cars were truly safe, they could revolutionize transportation.
Universal healthcare might work if it were properly funded and managed.
Nuclear weapons would be acceptable only as a last resort for national defense.

mixed_signals.description: Texts containing both positive and negative elements

cases.text: Social media helps me stay connected with friends, but it also wastes too much of my time.
Online shopping is convenient and saves time, though it hurts local businesses.
E-scooters are fun and eco-friendly but they clutter sidewalks and cause accidents.

short_text.description: Very short texts with minimal context

cases.text: Love it!
Ugh.
Cloudy today.

long_text.description: Long texts that may dilute stance signals

cases.text: Throughout history, humanity has faced numerous challenges that required global cooperation and innovative solutions. From the industrial revolution to the digital age, we have consistently adapted to changing circumstances. Today, we face perhaps our greatest challenge yet in addressing climate change. The scientific consensus is clear that human activities are contributing to global warming, and the consequences are already visible in rising sea levels, extreme weather events, and ecosystem disruption. While some argue that economic costs are too high, the long-term benefits of transitioning to renewable energy sources far outweigh the short-term investments required. We must act decisively to protect our planet for future generations.
Both Biden and Trump have their strengths, but Biden's experience in foreign policy gives him an edge.
While fossil fuels have powered our economy, renewable energy sources like solar and wind represent our future.

technical_language.description: Texts with technical or specialized language

cases.text: The backpropagation algorithm's efficiency in gradient descent optimization makes neural networks superior to traditional statistical methods.
Quantum decoherence and error rates in current NISQ devices limit practical applications significantly.
